title: My Ex-boyfriend Lost His Memory After Breaking Up - Novel Updates
author: Yi Huan   揖欢
description:
She fancied him, got together with him but then dumped him.

Jiang Yu wanted to meet him many times. But she didn’t expect that when she finally did, he simply passed by. Coldly saying : “I don’t know her.”

Later, she realized that he really didn’t remember her.>
